00020         public FormMonitor()
00021         {
00022             InitializeComponent();
00023 
00024             // we change locale to en-US to assure that our parsing and unparsing behaves consistently (dots as decimal separators etc.)
00025             Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture = new System.Globalization.CultureInfo("en-US");

00031         private void FormMonitor_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
00032         {
00033             //TripiHost = new System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost(typeof(TripiWCF.Service.TripServiceVolatile));
00034             TripiHost = new System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost(typeof(TripiWCF.Service.TripServiceXml));
00035 
00036             TripiHost.Open();
00037 
00038             Log("Rozpoczęto hostowanie usługi TripiWCF.");
00039 
00040             TripiWCF.Service.TripService.DatabaseInsert += RefreshLabels;
00041             TripiWCF.Service.TripService.DatabaseQuery += Log;
00042 
00043             Log("Obsługa zdarzeń podłączona.");
00044         }
00045 
00046         private void FormMonitor_FormClosed(object sender, FormClosedEventArgs e)
00047         {
00048             TripiHost.Close();
00049         }
00050 
00051         private void RefreshLabels(int trips, int nodes)
00052         {
00053             if (trips >= 0) labelTrips.Text = "Wycieczki: " + trips;
00054             if (nodes >= 0) labelNodes.Text = "Pozycje: " + nodes;
00055         }
00056 
00057         private void Log(string msg)
00058         {
00059             textBoxLawg.AppendText(msg + "\r\n");
00060         }
00061     }
